hymn.title: Lord, You are my only goal

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You are my on -- ly goal! You're my on -- ly hope! I on -- ly care for You! I nev -- er could re -- place You, And I would nev -- er want to. I have ev -- ery -- thing, Lord— I have You!

lyrics.stanza: Lord, You are my only goal! You're my only hope! I only care for You! I never could replace You, And I would never want to. I have everything, Lord— I have You!
